name: Let's Chaos!
description:
TUTORIAL:

Press A to go Left

Press D to go Right

Press Space to Jump

Help Kha, Princess of the Chaos Kingdom to gain great power and destroy the Land of Dusk by Gaining Chaos Power

Gain Chaos Power by:

Defeating Enemies by Jump on Top of Them, Collecting Chaos Points

Be careful with the traps!

Let's Chaos! from Rumah Sari
